title: Quarto debug figure path
text:
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

1 + 1

[1] 2

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
1.1 Plot

plot(cars)




Figure 1.1: distance vs speed




For MS Word output, Quarto can’t find this plot path because figure-docx doesn’t exist in _book/subdir/intro_files.
The following error message is generated.
[WARNING] Could not fetch resource intro_files/figure-docx/fig-cars-1.png: replacing image with description




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.
